mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANNOUNCE_DEPART VALUES (SEQ_ANNO.NEXTVAL, #{refDepart}, #{annoWR}, #{annoTitle}, #{annoContent}, #{accessReply}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{attachStatus})
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT VALUES (SEQ_ATTACH.NEXTVAL,#{refListCatNo},SEQ_ANNO.CURRVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT ANNO_NO, REF_DEPART,ANNO_WR, EMP_NAME, ANNO_TITLE, ACCESS_REPLY, ANNO_DATE, COUNT FROM ANNOUNCE_DEPART AD JOIN USER_INFO ON (ANNO_WR=EMP_NO) WHERE REF_DEPART = #{adno} AND AD.STATUS='Y'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ANNO_NO, REF_DEPART,ANNO_WR, EMP_NAME, ANNO_TITLE, ACCESS_REPLY, ANNO_DATE, COUNT FROM ANNOUNCE_DEPART AD JOIN USER_INFO ON (ANNO_WR=EMP_NO) WHERE REF_DEPART = #{adno} AND AD.STATUS='Y') WHERE ROWNUM <=6
SELECT * FROM( SELECT WRITE_NO, TITLE, B_DATE AS CREATE_DATE, EMP_NO, DEPARTMENT_NO AS DEPT_NO FROM BOARD WHERE DEPARTMENT_NO = #{departmentNo} AND BOARD_NO = 3) WHERE ROWNUM <=5
mapper.update: UPDATE ANNOUNCE_DEPART SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE ANNO_NO =#{adno} AND STATUS='Y'
mapper.select: SELECT ADT.ANNO_NO, REF_DEPART, ANNO_WR, EMP_NAME, ANNO_TITLE, ANNO_CONTENT, ACCESS_REPLY, COUNT, ATTACH_STATUS, JOB_NAME, AD.PREVNO, AD.NEXTNO FROM (SELECT ANNO_NO, LAG(ANNO_NO) OVER(ORDER BY ANNO_NO) AS PREVNO, LEAD(ANNO_NO) OVER(ORDER BY ANNO_NO) AS NEXTNO FROM ANNOUNCE_DEPART) AD JOIN ANNOUNCE_DEPART ADT ON (AD.ANNO_NO=ADT.ANNO_NO) JOIN USER_INFO UI ON(ADT.ANNO_WR=EMP_NO) JOIN JOB_RANK_MANAGEMENT JR ON (UI.JOB_NO=JR.JOB_NO) WHERE ADT.ANNO_NO =#{adno} AND ADT.STATUS='Y'
SELECT FILE_NO, REF_LIST_CAT_NO, LARGE_CAT, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_LIST_CAT_NO = 60 AND LARGE_CAT=#{adno} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE ANNOUNCE_DEPART SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE ANNO_NO = #{adno} AND STATUS ='Y'
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET STATUS ='N' WHERE FILE_NO=#{rlcn} AND REF_LIST_CAT_NO=60 AND STATUS='Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT VALUES (SEQ_ATTACH.NEXTVAL,#{refListCatNo},#{largeCat}, #{originName}, #{changeName}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT)
INSERT INTO ANNO_REPLY VALUES (SEQ_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{refDepartNo}, #{replyWriter}, #{replyTitle}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT AR_NO, ANNO_NO, REPLY_WRITER, EMP_NAME, REPLY_TITLE, TO_CHAR(AR_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS WR_DATE, AR_STATUS, JOB_NAME FROM ANNO_REPLY JOIN USER_INFO UI ON(REPLY_WRITER=EMP_NO) JOIN JOB_RANK_MANAGEMENT JR ON (UI.JOB_NO=JR.JOB_NO) WHERE ANNO_NO = #{adno} AND AR_STATUS='Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE ANNO_REPLY SET AR_STATUS='N' WHERE AR_NO = #{adro} AND AR_STATUS='Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT VALUES (SEQ_ANPRO.NEXTVAL, #{proWriter}, #{proDepart}, #{proTitle}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT)
INSERT INTO PRO_CLASS VALUES (SEQ_PRCL.NEXTVAL, SEQ_ANPRO.CURRVAL, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT J.PRO_NO, J.PRO_WRITER, J.PRO_DEPART, J.PRO_TITLE, PW.COUNT, J.PRO_DATE, J.PRO_STATUS FROM(SELECT * FROM PROJECT WHERE PRO_NO IN(SELECT REF_PRO FROM PRO_WATCHER WHERE PW_ATTEN =#{emno} AND PW_STATUS = 'Y')) J, (SELECT COUNT(PW_ATTEN) AS COUNT, REF_PRO FROM PRO_WATCHER JOIN PROJECT ON(PRO_NO=REF_PRO) WHERE PW_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY REF_PRO ) PW WHERE J.PRO_NO = PW.REF_PRO ORDER BY PRO_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT_FAV VALUES (#{proNo}, #{proWriter}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT J.PRO_NO, J.PRO_WRITER, J.PRO_DEPART, J.PRO_TITLE, PW.COUNT, J.PRO_DATE, J.PRO_STATUS FROM(SELECT * FROM PROJECT WHERE PRO_NO IN(SELECT REF_PRO FROM PRO_WATCHER WHERE PW_ATTEN =#{emno} AND PW_STATUS = 'Y')) J, (SELECT COUNT(PW_ATTEN) AS COUNT, REF_PRO FROM PRO_WATCHER JOIN PROJECT ON(PRO_NO=REF_PRO) WHERE PW_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY REF_PRO ) PW WHERE J.PRO_NO = PW.REF_PRO AND J.PRO_NO IN (SELECT FAV_PRO FROM PROJECT_FAV WHERE PF_EMP=#{emno}) ORDER BY PRO_NO
SELECT * FROM PROJECT WHERE PRO_NO = #{pjno} AND PRO_STATUS ='Y'
SELECT * FROM PRO_CLASS WHERE REF_PRO = #{pjno} AND PC_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT PW_NO, REF_PRO, PW_ATTEN, PW_STATUS, EMP_NAME, JOB_NAME, U.DEPARTMENT_NO, DEPARTMENT_TITLE FROM PRO_WATCHER P JOIN USER_INFO U ON (U.EMP_NO = P.PW_ATTEN) JOIN JOB_RANK_MANAGEMENT J ON(U.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT_MANAGEMENT D ON (U.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO) WHERE REF_PRO = #{pjno} AND PW_STATUS='Y'
SELECT * FROM SEMI_PRO WHERE REF_PRO = #{pjno} AND SEMI_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SEMI_PRO (SEMI_NO, REF_PRO, REF_PC, SEMI_WRITER, SEMI_TITLE, SEMI_DATE, SEMI_STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_SEMI.NEXTVAL, #{refPro}, #{refPc}, #{semiWriter}, #{semiTitle}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT)
mapper.update:
UPDATE PRO_CLASS
SET PC_ONE = NULL
SET PC_TWO = NULL
SET PC_THREE = NULL
SET PC_FOUR = NULL
WHERE PC_NO =#{pcNo} AND PC_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE SEMI_PRO SET SEMI_STATUS ='N' WHERE REF_PC=#{originpc} AND SEMI_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SEMI_PRO WHERE SEMI_NO = #{sino} AND SEMI_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE SEMI_PRO SET SEMI_DUE = NULL WHERE SEMI_NO = #{semiNo} AND SEMI_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT_CHECKLIST VALUES (SEQ_SEMICH.NEXTVAL, #{refSemi}, #{checkContent}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{writerNo})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PROJECT_CHECKLIST WHERE REF_SEMI = #{refSemi} AND CHECK_STATUS='Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE PROJECT_CHECKLIST SET CHECK_STATUS = 'N' WHERE CKECK_NO = #{ckeckNo} AND CHECK_STATUS='Y'
UPDATE PROJECT_CHECKLIST SET CHECK_STATUS = 'N' WHERE REF_SEMI = #{refSemi} AND CHECK_STATUS='Y'
UPDATE PROJECT_CHECKLIST SET CHECK_CONFIRM = 'Y' WHERE CKECK_NO = #{ckeckNo} AND CHECK_STATUS='Y' AND CHECK_CONFIRM ='N'
UPDATE PROJECT_CHECKLIST SET CHECK_CONFIRM = 'N' WHERE CKECK_NO = #{ckeckNo} AND CHECK_STATUS='Y' AND CHECK_CONFIRM ='Y'
mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NO, EMP_NAME, JOB_NAME, DEPARTMENT_TITLE FROM USER_INFO U JOIN JOB_RANK_MANAGEMENT J ON(U.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT_MANAGEMENT D ON (U.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'N' AND EMP_NO NOT IN (SELECT PW_ATTEN FROM PRO_WATCHER WHERE REF_PRO = #{pjno} AND PW_STATUS = 'Y')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SEMI_REPLY VALUES (SEQ_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{refDepartNo}, #{replyWriter}, #{replyTitle}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT SR_NO AS REPLY_NO, REF_SEMIPRO AS REF_DEPARTNO, SR_WRITER AS REPLY_WRITER, EMP_NAME AS WRITER_NAME, SR_CONTENT AS REPLY_TITLE, TO_CHAR(SR_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS WR_DATE, SR_STATUS AS STATUS, JOB_NAME AS WRITER_JO FROM SEMI_REPLY JOIN USER_INFO UI ON(SR_WRITER=EMP_NO) JOIN JOB_RANK_MANAGEMENT JR ON (UI.JOB_NO=JR.JOB_NO) WHERE REF_SEMIPRO = #{refDepartNo} AND SR_STATUS='Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT VALUES (SEQ_ATTACH.NEXTVAL,61,#{largeCat}, #{originName}, #{changeName}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REF_LIST_CAT_NO = 61 AND LARGE_CAT = #{semiNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE SEMI_REPLY SET SR_STATUS = 'N' WHERE REF_SEMIPRO = #{semiNo} AND SR_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE LARGE_CAT = #{semiNo} AND REF_LIST_CAT_NO = 61 AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT EMP_NO, EMP_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, A.CHANGE_NAME FROM USER_INFO U LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (A.LARGE_CAT = U.EMP_NO) WHERE DEPARTMENT_NO = #{departmentNo}
